item.description:
Hi Scott and Donna,
Could you please help spread the word that I will have an exhibit of black and white photographs of the ancient megalithic stone monuments of Ireland, including work from Stonehenge, as well as photographs of some of the 14th and 15th century Abbeys of Ireland. The show will open January 4th fro 2-4 PM and be up until January 17th., in the Mays gallery at the Providence Art Club, 11 Thomas Street, Providence, RI 02903. For directions, a map is on www.providenceartclub.org


Thanks!

Have a wonderful Christmas and New year,

Best,
Ron Rosenstock

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: Megalithic stone monuments of Ireland: Photos by Ron Rosenstock
